title: What will the new client run on?
body:
Title basically tells everything.
PLS don't tell me it's Adobe Air :P

btw im super hyped about the alpha signups and really like the way you try to give us players early insight on the process so we can help improving it from the players side of view ;)

replies.body: It's not Adobe AIR :P We're using HTML/JS/CSS for the UI, C++ for the core functionality. Stay tuned for an in-depth Engineering blog about the tech that will be published later during the alpha.

> [{quoted}](name=CapnBranFlakes,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=AyfT4sKG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-27T18:55:04.321+0000)
>
> It's not Adobe AIR :P We're using HTML/JS/CSS for the UI, C++ for the core functionality. Stay tuned for an in-depth Engineering blog about the tech that will be published later during the alpha.

<3

I got one question.
The Alpha client will remove Adobe AIR in all parts, the in-game client will still using AIR or the in-game client doesn't use AIR.
Thanks in advance. :)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot a huevo,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=AyfT4sKG,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-14T03:20:59.738+0000)
>
> Yeah no AIR at all. The game is mostly C++.
Oh, thanks for the reply. I didn't see the Rioter quote. <3
I don't think AIR has anything to do with in-game, it's just the out of game client that AIR is infecting.
Yeah no AIR at all. The game is mostly C++.
